title: Not quite useful
comment: Really looking for something that will help me plan my hike, but only shows the next event so isn't really useful for planning more than about 12 hours out.

comment: As of the 4.4.2 update sadly this no longer works for me which is a great shame as I found it an invaluable addition.

title: Pretty good
comment: It'd be better if it had the option to add a specific location instead of it just using location services. That way I could always know sunrise and sunset for home no matter where I am.
Seems no updates

title: Really good addition to dashclock but...
comment: .... Doesn't want to work all the time. When altering the time display interval (ie to display 2 hours before sunset/sunrise) it will not display on main screen. Needs some tweaks.

title: Great idea but bad execution
comment: Stumbled upon this app after trying dashclock. But this app showed a fixed sunrise & sunset time. Has never given me accurate times since the installation. I hope the dev fixes this.

title: Does not work for me
comment: I noticed the default weather extension cannot find my location, this may be the case with this one too. If just doesn't work.

title: Small, simple, and solid
comment: It does what it's meant to do.

title: Nicely done
comment: A simple view of the times for the next sunrise and sunset.

title: Times out by half an hour
comment: Sunset and Sunrise times are half an hour fast for Adelaide Australia

title: Perfect
comment: Does just what it says.

title: Does Not Work

title: Awesome, BUT
comment: From today on the app started crashing and has force closed already tens of times today. It did not do it yesterday, but now I realized that in my location, from today on the sun does not rise until next time in February. So basically the app propably crashes because of this. Fix would be nice.  Yes, I live quite long to the north.

comment: No matter how many times I uninstall and reinstall it fails to showup in my dashclock widget. It shows in the list of extensions but never shows when applied

title: Love the simple design and ease of use

title: Fun feature!

I don't keep my GPS on which unfortunately makes this app not work.

title: Choose location?

title: Great extension
comment: Now just add support to send the information to a Pebble smart watch for example 1 or 2 hours before sunset/sunrise and you've got the perfect little app here!

comment: I wish I could automatically set alarms for sunrise times

title: Exactly what I was looking
comment: If this works then it is exactly what I was looking 4. Can't wait to try this out

title: Simple but effective
comment: Very convenient way to see what sunrise/set times are. Only reason its not 5 stars is there is a setting option, but it does nothing.  Unclear what settings could be controlled, but it would be nice to be able to specify the location for sunrise/sunset and not just assume the current location.

title: Nice
comment: Would like to choose an app when clicked on.

title: Love it
comment: Would like an option to simplify the info to one line. E.g. 6:45 am / 5:37 pm No need for labeling them sunrise and sunset. AM and PM explains it.
